claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a fragment of a clinical‐study table and footnotes showing percentages of adverse events (e.g., “6,” “<1,” “2,” etc.) and definitions of fever grades (“Mild (≥100.4° to <101.1°F); Moderate (≥101.2°F to …)”) along with references to U.S.-licensed IIV3 in Studies 3 and 4. There is no mention anywhere in the image of Flublok’s approved age range or that it is approved for adults 18 years and older. Because the claim concerns regulatory approval by age and the image only shows safety data and study footnotes without any age-approval statement, it does not support the claim.
